Descriptive analysis of products

Source: vignettes/articles/descriptive-analysis-products.Rmd
descriptive-analysis-products.Rmd

This article shows how to calculate the descriptive analysis of products for emission and sector profile.

Example subset of product-level output of emissions profile. 

emission_product_example <- example_emission_ep_product_des_analysis()
kable(emission_product_example |> head(20))
companies_id ep_product emission_profile
comp_1 a high
comp_1 b high
comp_1 c high
comp_1 d NA
comp_1 e NA
comp_2 a high
comp_2 b high
comp_2 c high

Example subset of product-level output of sector profile. 

sector_product_example <- example_sector_ep_product_des_analysis()
kable(sector_product_example |> head(20))
companies_id ep_product sector_profile
comp_1 a high
comp_1 b high
comp_1 c high
comp_1 d NA
comp_1 e NA
comp_2 a high
comp_2 b high
comp_2 c high

Distinct products of emission and sector profile 

cat("Distinct products of emission profile:", n_distinct(emission_product_example$ep_product))

Distinct products of emission profile: 5

cat("Distinct products of sector profile:", n_distinct(sector_product_example$ep_product))

Distinct products of sector profile: 5

Matched distinct products of emission and sector profile 

cat("Matched distinct products of emission profile:", matched_distinct_products(emission_product_example, "emission_profile"))

Matched distinct products of emission profile: 3

cat("Matched distinct products of sector profile:", matched_distinct_products(sector_product_example, "sector_profile"))

Matched distinct products of sector profile: 3

Average amount of distinct products per company for emission and sector profile 

cat("Average amount of distinct products per company for emission profile:", avg_distinct_products_per_company(emission_product_example))

Average amount of distinct products per company for emission profile: 4

cat("Average amount of distinct products per company for sector profile:", avg_distinct_products_per_company(sector_product_example))

Average amount of distinct products per company for sector profile: 4

Average amount of distinct products per company for transition risk profile

companies_id product
dystopic_kingbird porches, metal
private_arrowana porches, metal
insecticidal_clownanemonefish prefabricated houses
animalistic_grub prefabricated houses
wingless_northernpike prefabricated houses
epitaphic_yellowhammer prefabricated houses 
cat("Average amount of distinct products per company for transition risk profile:", avg_distinct_products_per_company(transition_risk_product_example))

Average amount of distinct products per company for transition risk profile: 1

Distinct products without a risk category for emission and sector profile 

cat("Distinct products without a risk category for emission profile:", distinct_products_without_risk_category(emission_product_example, "emission_profile"))

Distinct products without a risk category for emission profile: 2

cat("Distinct products without a risk category for sector profile:", distinct_products_without_risk_category(sector_product_example, "sector_profile"))

Distinct products without a risk category for sector profile: 2

Average profile ranking of all products per benchmarks 

kable(profile_rank_df)
ep_product benchmark profile_ranking
tent all 1.0000000
tent isic_4digit 1.0000000
tent tilt_subsector 1.0000000
tent unit 1.0000000
tent unit_isic_4digit 1.0000000
tent unit_tilt_subsector 1.0000000
surface engineering all 0.3333333
surface engineering isic_4digit 1.0000000
surface engineering tilt_subsector 1.0000000
surface engineering unit 0.5000000
surface engineering unit_isic_4digit 1.0000000
surface engineering unit_tilt_subsector 1.0000000 
kable(avg_profile_ranking_df, align = "lc", caption = "Average profile ranking of all products per benchmarks", escape = F) |>
  kable_classic(full_width = F, html_font = "Cambria") |>
  column_spec(1:2, width = "2.5cm")
Average profile ranking of all products per benchmarks
benchmark avg_profile_ranking
all 0.6666667
isic_4digit 1.0000000
tilt_subsector 1.0000000
unit 0.7500000
unit_isic_4digit 1.0000000
unit_tilt_subsector 1.0000000

Average reduction targets of all products per benchmarks 

kable(reduction_targets_df)
ep_product reduction_targets scenario_year
tent 0.18 1.5C RPS_2030
tent 0.98 1.5C RPS_2050
tent 0.40 NZ 2050_2030
tent 0.97 NZ 2050_2050
surface engineering 0.09 1.5C RPS_2030
surface engineering 0.95 1.5C RPS_2050
surface engineering 0.22 NZ 2050_2030
surface engineering 0.96 NZ 2050_2050 
kable(avg_reduction_targets_df, align = "lc", caption = "Average reduction targets of all products per benchmarks", escape = F) |>
  kable_classic(full_width = F, html_font = "Cambria") |>
  column_spec(2, width = "5cm")

scenario_year avg_reduction_targets

1.5C RPS_2050 0.965
NZ 2050_2030 0.310
NZ 2050_2050 0.965

Average transition risk scores of all products per tilt_subsector benchmarks 

kable(trs_df)
product grouping_transition_risk transition_risk_score

tent 1.5C RPS_2050_tilt_subsector 0.990
tent NZ 2050_2030_tilt_subsector 0.700
tent NZ 2050_2050_tilt_subsector 0.985

surface engineering 1.5C RPS_2050_tilt_subsector 0.975
surface engineering NZ 2050_2030_tilt_subsector 0.610
surface engineering NZ 2050_2050_tilt_subsector 0.980

  column_spec(2, width = "5cm")

Average NA share per company with atleast one matched product for emission profile

Companies with atleast one matched product 

kable(companies_atleast_one_matched_product)
companies_id ep_product emission_profile
asteria_megalotomusquinquespinosus tent high
skarn_gallinule sheds, construction site high
relegable_southernhairnosedwombat tent high
psychodelic_airedale tent high
ergophilic_fieldspaniel tent high

Average NA share per company which have atleast one matched product 

kable(result)
companies_id emission_category_NA
asteria_megalotomusquinquespinosus 0
skarn_gallinule 0
relegable_southernhairnosedwombat 0
psychodelic_airedale 0
ergophilic_fieldspaniel 0 
cat("Average NA share per company with atleast one matched product for emission profile:", average_result)

Average NA share per company with atleast one matched product for emission profile: 0
